lead_paragraph: Anthony hosted a community forum with local youth and police officers, while Jordan said in a statement that he was “deeply troubled” by recent violence.

byline.contributor: Jonah Engel Bromwich contributed to this report

headline.print_headline: Anthony Hosts a Community Forum While Jordan Voices His Frustration
headline.main: Carmelo Anthony and Michael Jordan Address Social Issues With Differing Approaches

snippet: Anthony hosted a community forum with local youth and police officers, while Jordan said in a statement that he was “deeply troubled” by recent violence....
abstract: Carmelo Anthony hosts event at Challengers Boys & Girls Club in Los Angeles for young people, local leaders, police officers and professional basketball players to discuss police shootings and killings of police officers; separately, Michael Jordan releases statement announcing donations to NAACP Legal Defense and Educational Fund and the Institute for Community-Police Relations.
